snippet.title: Zone 300 - Level 1
snippet.description:
Zone 300
Level 1: The Spaceport

Zone 300 is a 32-level megawad for Doom 2 created by Paul Corfiatis (Pcorf). Every level, with the exception of Level 32, contains no more than 300 linedefs. The levels are fairly small and not too difficult. Blast you way through techbases, dungeons and hellish abodes and save Earth from extinction.

EXE: PrBoom+ v2.5.1.4-test
Recorded with: Camtasia Studio 8
Difficulty: Ultra-Violence
Music Card: OPL (Adlib/Soundblaster)
Controls: Slightly modified Vanilla Doom controls (Keyboard only)

Download Zone 300 here:
http://www.doomworld.com/idgames/?id=17362
